CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: KWESST develops and commercializes proprietary next-generation technologies that deliver a tactical advantage for military, security forces, and personal defense. KWESST capabilities and market offerings are grouped into three main lines of business: Non-Lethal, Digitization, and Counter-Threat.
